scripts.build: rimraf dist && run-p build-library build-playground lint && echo ✔ done production build
scripts.build-debug: rimraf dist && run-p build-library build-playground-debug lint && echo ✔ done debug build
scripts.build-playground: mkdirp dist/common/ && browserify -p tsify source/common/index.ts > dist/common/index.bundle.js
scripts.build-playground-debug: mkdirp dist/common/ && browserify --debug -p tsify source/common/index.ts > dist/common/index.bundle.js
